scripts.release: standard-version --release-as patch -a -t "dayjs/v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): dayjs/v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:next: standard-version --release-as minor -a -t "dayjs/v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): dayjs/v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major -a -t "dayjs/v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): dayjs/v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
